metadata.synopsis: This VB plays after attempting to get Ethel to remove the tadpole. She confesses that there's something special about it and she can't remove it.Will play on the player who leaves the dialog that reveals this fact, but characters can be fairly opinionated here since they are reacting to knowledge.Up to two characters.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: The tadpole was tampered with? That complicates things...

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Tampered or not, we need to get these things out of our heads. Let's find another way.
